56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Ka`b bin Malik used to say:"Scarcely did Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) set out for a journey on a day other than Thursday

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَرَادَ غَزْوَةً فَوَرَّى بِغَيْرِهَا، وَمَنْ أَحَبَّ الْخُرُوجَ يَوْمَ الْخَمِيسِ
chapter.eng-name: Concealing the true destination of a Ghazwa
